snippet: Itau Unibanco of Brazil plans to buy the 49.99 percent of the payment processor Redecard that it does not already own for 11.77 billion reals, or $6.81 billion, Reuters reports.
abstract: Itau Unibanco of Brazil plans to buy the 49.99 percent of the payment processor Redecard that it does not already own for 11.77 billion reals, or $6.81 billion, Reuters reports.
lead_paragraph: Itau Unibanco of Brazil plans to buy the 49.99 percent of the payment processor Redecard that it does not already own for 11.77 billion reals, or $6.81 billion, Reuters reports. It will be the biggest Brazilian deal since 2008, according to Thomson Reuters. Read more »
